system.description: Whenever you or another creature within 60 feet of you casts a spell with a costly material component, you receive 30% of the gp value of the consumed component as @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.QNaWbjmkXojSCeZj]{Non-Fungible Eldritch Tokens} (NFETs) You can spend NFETs like electrum pieces at a 1:1 ratio, but you must receive some good or service from the transaction, and they cannot be given away.
